name: Tanith First and Only
summary: During the Sabbat Worlds Crusade, the planet Tanith was called on to raise regiments for the Astra Militarum for the first time in its history. During the Founding ceremony, a Chaos fleet slipped through the Imperial Navy blockade - destroying the defenseless Tanith. Around 3,500 Guardsmen escaped - lead by Colonel-Commissar Ibram Gaunt - who would become the 'Tanith First and Only'.
